sentences.sentence: Broccoli, cauliflower, and cabbage are all part of the cruciferous vegetable family.
sentences.translation: 西兰花、菜花和卷心菜都是十字花科蔬菜。

sentences.sentence: Included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage are cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.translation: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜属于绿色组蔬菜，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物阻断剂。

sentences.sentence: Other great choices are veggies from the cruciferous family, which include cauliflower and Brussels sprouts. And you can try new ways to use these vegetables.
sentences.translation: 另一种非常好的选择是花类蔬菜，包括花椰菜和抱子甘蓝。你也可用新方法制作这些蔬菜。
